price: Mbega Imana Allah Ishoboye gukora ivyo vyose, ntishoboye kuzura abapfuye, Ikabasubiza ubuzima[3]!
arabic: أَلَيۡسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحۡـِۧيَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ
footnotes: [3] Iyo umuntu ahejeje gusoma iyo Aayah, aca avuga yemanga ati: “BALAA INNAHUU LAQAADIRUN ALAA DHAALIK” (Ibuzwa n’iki! Mu vy’ukuri, Irabishoboye pe!).

meta.transliteration: alaysa dhālika biqādirin ʿalā an yuḥ'yiya al-mawtā
